alert.note: Alert for Tom Green (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Angelo (Central Texas San Angelo)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued May 19 at 9:23PM CDT until May 19 at 10:00PM CDT by NWS San Angelo
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 945 PM CDT FOR TOM GREEN COUNTY... At 923 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near San Angelo, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. This severe storm will be near... Veribest around 940 PM CDT. Mereta around 955 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Harriet and Us-67 Near The Irion-Tom Green County Line. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
